name: Lotnisko im. Mikołaja Kopernika we Wrocławiu
description: Formerly named Wrocław Strachowice, Wrocław Nicolaus Copernicus Airport honors Polish renaissance mathematician and astronomer Nicolaus Copernicus, who formulated a model of the universe that placed the Sun rather than the Earth at its center. Its airport code honors its home in *Wro*cław.
